description: Designed for skiers looking for performance whatever the conditions, the Salomon RC8 eSKIN offers excellent classic performance without the daily waxing. The eSKINGRIP+ insert guarantees precise, secure and quiet grip, while the all-new Stringer core with inverted fishbone structure is both light and efficient. Supplied with pre-mounted Shift fixings. <br><br>Master diagonal steps on any terrain with classic style gear. Long, grippy classic skis for reliable grip. Soft shoes for efficient steps. Stable fixings for controlled pivoting. Take classic style to the next level!<br><br>Improve your technique with equipment designed for performance and ease. Our responsive skis provide optimal control, ideal for perfecting your steps. Shoes with high performance support optimize grip and ensure impeccable power transmission. Precision fixings complete the package. Perfect your technique with equipment designed to really progress.<br><br>Improve your classic technique with Skingrip innovation. Mohair/synthetic skin in the grip area for impeccable grip and glide. Reliable propulsion on all types of terrain and snow. Opt for high performance skiing with ease.<br>
name: RC8 eSkin X-Hard + Prolink Shift - Set
